bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description: The following unit tests are currently failing on DL4J master: TestCompGraphCNN.testCNNComputationaGraph TestComputationGraphNetwork.testPreprocessorAddition TestOptimizers .testRosenbrackFnOptLineGraphDesce .testRosenbrockFnOptBFGS .testRosen....CG DataSetIteratorTest.testCifarIterator, .testCifarModel LayerConfigValidationTest .testRegNotSetL1Global .testRegNotSetL2Local .testLRPolicyMissingDecayRate .testDropConnect NeuralNetConfigurationTest.testLearningRateByParam SubsamplingLayerTest.testSubSampleLayerMaxBackprop RBMTests.testSetGetParams BatchNormalizationTest .testCnnShapeBatchNormBack .testDnnShapeBatchNormBack SeedTest.testAutoEncoderSeed TestDropout.testDropoutMultiLayer MultiLayerTest.testBatchNorm

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
